channel.title: Donator
channel.description:
Hi everyone, got little problem, I've downloaded an source with already in donator. so looked for anycommand to make some 1 donator in client, searched for donar, givedonar, givedonator, givedonater, donater, donated, tried all like that in server also looked for any other give command or something with donate in it.
but there isnt 1. how i know there is donator, the old owner left his acc, so i changed pass, and when i log in its say welcome_DONATOR_TY something like that, and he can trade donatorshop,
so i thought no problem i just change in character donator 1 like he got, didnt work-.- so i thought second option just copy all except name and pass did, even compiled while it shouldnt have to, stil i wasnt donator. every tiem i logged out and looked in my character it was gone to 0 -.-
anyone know whats wrong? cause if he can be donator why not me?

item.title: Donator
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Despair Mr. Despair
item.description:
@Mr_Despair wrote:

Go into client.java and search

if (playerRights == 2) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("ty")) { or just search TY and look for where his name is and change the name inside parentheses of where it says donator to your name.

Read full topic

item.title: Donator
item.dc:creator: @de_dust89 de dust89
item.description:
@de_dust89 wrote:

In the Config folder, you should see something like donators.txt open that, and put your name in on the next line. for example.

Bill
Joey
Killall
PKER

would all be donators.

Read full topic

item.title: Donator
item.dc:creator: @elvemaqe elvemaqe
item.description:
@elvemaqe wrote:

Hi everyone,
got little problem,
I’ve downloaded an source with already in donator.
so looked for anycommand to make some 1 donator in client,
searched for donar, givedonar, givedonator, givedonater, donater, donated,
tried all like that in server also looked for any other give command or something with donate in it.

but there isnt 1.
how i know there is donator, the old owner left his acc, so i changed pass, and when i log in its say welcome_DONATOR_TY something like that, and he can trade donatorshop,

so i thought no problem i just change in character donator 1 like he got, didnt work-.-
so i thought second option just copy all except name and pass did, even compiled while it shouldnt have to, stil i wasnt donator. every tiem i logged out and looked in my character it was gone to 0 -.-

anyone know whats wrong? cause if he can be donator why not me?
